name: request-animation-frame-shim
author: Eryk Napierala
description: Module for measuring average frames per second value.

scripts.dist: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.prepublish: npm run precompile && npm run compile
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm run prepublish; git commit -a -m 'Build dist/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags && npm publish
